group_1.textLeft: After you gave us your life force and allowed@for us to survive…
We were put to sleep in The Freezer, where@we kept having the same dream…
In which our original version,@Michiru Kazusa,
didn’t tell anyone the cruel truth about@Magical Girls.
Engulfed by despair,@she ultimately turned into a Witch…
But even if Magical Girls can never escape...
...their destiny to become Witches,
we didn’t want Michiru’s story to end@with “despair”…
We wanted to wipe the tears spilled@that day clean…
…That was the dream we wished to see.

group_1.textRight: When you gave us your life force,
the four of us also received your memories.
Maybe with multiple “Michirus” together, we could@conceive wisdom that’d leave even Manjushri in awe.
We would bring Michiru Kazusa back,@and start over from the day we met.

group_1.textLeft: She’d live her days with her past friends@“once more.”
She’d have the same dreams, nightmares,@at the same home…
So that “Michiru,” of her own will,
could tell her friends about the cruel reality@of the Magical Girl system…
And, if she could manage to live...
...past the day it was all supposed to end…
The end of Michiru’s story wouldn’t be@one of “despair,”
There’d be salvation…@”hope,” left behind instead.

group_1.textRight: That was us copies’ evil plan;@our retribution to you.
We are all clones, aren’t we?
How did you go about executing@a plan like that?

group_1.textLeft: Isn’t that obvious…
There is one that approaches teary-eyed girls,@and entraps them with sweet whispers…
“Miracles and magic are real.”
Right on the money.

group_1.narration: “Out of all the clones number 4 had secured,@numbers 2, 6, 7 and 10…”
“The first one to completely recover and emerge@from stasis was me, number 10.”
“Taking notice of my potential wish,@the Incubator showed me@my successful counterpart,@‘Kazumi Subaru’”
“I made my wish without a second thought…”
[flashEffect:flashWhite2]“Make number 4 into ‘Michiru Kazusa’…@Make her into a real, human Michiru.”
“And so, as per my wish,@clone number 4 was completely reborn@as the real Michiru.”
“Apparently, your memories from@before and after that were@rearranged to make sense@with themselves.”
“The next clone to wake up was number 2.”
“What number 2 received from their contract@with Kyubey was ‘Nico Kanna’s ability.’”
[flashEffect:flashWhite2]“She transformed number 10 into Saki Asami,@and herself into Nico Kanna.”
“The other two were also quick to@wake up and become Magical Girls.”

group_1.textRight: …are the clones number 6 and 7,@sleeping here right now.

group_1.textLeft: Indeed…
In order to avoid meeting with the real ones,
We made our base further north of Asunaro@City.
We arranged a building identical to the@Misaki residence,
and waited until the real ones left for@a long enough period.
I see…you planned everything.

group_1.textRight: Umika and Kaoru made their contracts right@in front of me, didn’t they?
But they were already Magical Girls@by then…?!

group_1.textLeft: I can make a miracle happen to you too,@if you so desire.
It surprised me, and I didn’t know what was@going on,
but what this little guy is saying is true.
That’s why, I don’t want you to throw away@your will to live.

group_1.textRight: I’m pretty sure Kyubey showed up@back then...

group_1.textLeft: Umika is a Magical Girl of reading and writing.
If she can read memories,@then she sure can also write her own.

group_1.textRight: So, the Kyubey I saw back then…

group_1.textLeft: Oh, he was there,@but just watching all smug.
He’d already made his contract with@them long ago.
I’ll take that as a compliment.
Anyhow, the stage has been thoroughly@prepared.
And now, number 4…the rest is up to you.
